meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Dee Brady Paul Levy Dan Katz Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1358.

td.p: Dee Brady, a teacher from San Antonio, Texas
Paul Levy, a graphic designer originally from Brooklyn, New York
Dan Katz, an attorney originally from Baltimore, Maryland (whose 1-day cash winnings total $8,200)

tr.td: GEOGRAPHY
RELIGION
BASEBALL
SEA LIFE
THE MOVIES
IN OTHER WORDS...
